Posts.Content: EbeyR wrote: I am from Australia and had similar lump in the bottom right quadrant of my right breast. My GP suggested an ultrasound and could find solid hypoechoid mass and I have swollen lymph in the same side. One more Round lump smaller in size is also detected. Larger lump is well circumscribed with macrolobule 3.1x3x3.1cm in dimension. Nild stromal distortion is noted. I had a miscarriage 3 weeks before and I guess it may be a fibroadenoma due to hormone imbalance. I am so worried and had my mammogram and FNA today for the biopsy. Will get the results by tomorrow. Please help. Radiologist says the larger mass have circumscribed margins but some irregularities that makes some concern... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Please help to reduce this tension EbeyR Kayla250
